title: Genetic Association Analysis with R (II)
text: relevant scripts inst/scripts directory source package. Briefly, create_github_pository.sh called create gaawr2 GitHub command line. create_package.R used create package R. pkgdown.sh called make pkgdown-style package vignette set processed bookdown package. docs.sh used push files GitHub. Note creation GitHub repository, SSH key already place. order pkgdown.sh function well, required files nature-genetics.csl need available. GitHub login still necessary enable web pages, can accessed https://jinghuazhao.github.io/gaawr2/. Upon use pkgdown, article can seen https://jinghuazhao.github.io/gaawr2/articles/index.html. carry adding files NEWS.md _pkgdown.yml.
